last_episode_to_air.name: A Glorious End, Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the fate of the universe at stake, the royal heirs and their allies must gather their forces for the ultimate battle to defeat General Morando.

name: 3Below: Tales of Arcadia
overview: After crash-landing on Earth, two royal teen aliens on the run struggle to blend in with humans as they evade intergalactic bounty hunters.

episodes.name: Terra Incognita, Part 1
episodes.overview: When their planet's monarchy is overthrown by a coup, royal alien teens Aja and Krel flee to Earth accompanied by their brutish bodyguard.

episodes.name: Terra Incognita, Part 2
episodes.overview: After crash-landing in the town of Arcadia, the royals -- now disguised as humans -- search for suitable technology to power their ship.

episodes.name: Mind Over Matter
episodes.overview: Krel builds a mind-reading device in hopes of blending in with humans. Elsewhere, General Morando dispatches bounty hunters to track down the royals.

episodes.name: Beetle Mania
episodes.overview: Royal super-fan Stuart offers to help eradicate an alien beetle infestation before it exposes the siblings' true identities.

episodes.name: Collision Course
episodes.overview: The royals take a driver’s ed class, hoping to find parts for their ship. Instead, they're led on a high-speed chase with the Zeron Brotherhood!

episodes.name: D'aja Vu
episodes.overview: A giant troll wreaks havoc at the school science fair, threatening to expose both the troll world -- and the royals’ true identities.

episodes.name: Flying the Coop
episodes.overview: Aja and Krel are summoned by the school board to produce proper identification. Zadra discovers the identity of the traitor who aided the coup.

episodes.name: Party Crashers
episodes.overview: An incoming message from Akiridion-5 alarms Vex. Meanwhile, the arrival of bounty hunters ruins the royals' outing in the woods with friends.

episodes.name: Lightning in a Bottle
episodes.overview: The royal heirs look for Aja's missing serrator in the forest, where they mistake Trollhunter Jim Lake's Amulet of Daylight for her lost weapon.

episodes.name: The Arcadian Job
episodes.overview: In a daring heist, the royals and Stuart infiltrate a high-security military base in hopes of stealing the final part to power the mothership.

episodes.name: Truth Be Told
episodes.overview: Aja decides to tell Steve she’s actually an alien, but her confession is cut short by a visit from the Zeron Brotherhood.

episodes.name: Last Night on Earth
episodes.overview: The royals celebrate their last day of school -- and on Earth -- with friends, but Zadra's arrival with revelations of betrayal shakes them to the core.

episodes.name: Bad Omen
episodes.overview: Alpha unleashes a barrage of attacks on the siblings, enabling Omen to hijack the ship and take the royal cores. Will this be the end of House Tarron?

episodes.name: Moving Day
episodes.overview: Left vulnerable after Omen's attack, the royal heirs look to conceal their damaged ship but are soon confronted by the bounty hunter Magmatron.

episodes.name: Moonlight Run
episodes.overview: Aja and Krel enlist Stuart to help find their former ally, who’s being held prisoner at a bounty hunter outpost on the moon.

episodes.name: Dogfight Days of Summer
episodes.overview: With General Morando's invasion of Earth imminent, Krel tries to stop the fleet's advance with unwitting help from the kids of Arcadia.

episodes.name: Mother's Day
episodes.overview: Mother, the AI controlling the royals’ ship, reflects on keeping the peace between her quarreling family. Morando discovers a secret hidden on Earth.

episodes.name: Ill Gotten Gains
episodes.overview: Colonel Kubritz stages a phony quarantine of Arcadia High School in a ploy to capture the royals -- and their advanced weapons technology.

episodes.name: There's Something About Gwen (of Gorbon)
episodes.overview: Stuart gets an unexpected visit from his ex-girlfriend. Krel helps Toby and Eli produce a short film, "Kleb or Alive," for a local contest.

episodes.name: Asteroid Rage
episodes.overview: Unable to stop an asteroid hurtling toward Earth, Kubritz pleads with the royals to help destroy it by offering stored alien technology from Area 49B.

episodes.name: Luug's Day Out
episodes.overview: Krel builds a prototype device that will create a wormhole back to Akiridion-5, but Luug swallows it whole before it can be tested further.

episodes.name: The Fall of House Tarron
episodes.overview: The last defenders of House Tarron face off against General Morando and his army of Omen robots in an all-out battle for survival.

episodes.name: The Big Sleep
episodes.overview: With General Morando searching for Gaylen's Core, Aja and Krel must travel into their parents' subconscious to learn the core's location first.

episodes.name: Race to Trollmarket
episodes.overview: After learning the location of Gaylen’s Core, Toby calls Trollhunter Jim Lake, and Blinky advises the royals to consult the Soothscryer.

episodes.name: A Glorious End, Part 1
episodes.overview: As the town of Arcadia gathers for the premiere of "Kleb or Alive," an army of Omens, led by an armored Kubritz, makes plans to lure out the royals.

episodes.name: A Glorious End, Part 2
episodes.overview: With the fate of the universe at stake, the royal heirs and their allies must gather their forces for the ultimate battle to defeat General Morando.
